main event: Multiple sightings of unidentified bright lights over Miami, Florida, between April 1955 and April 1958.
interesting points: Sightings reported bright lights with unusual movements,One report described a green flare followed by a bright light,Multiple reports indicate the objects moved in semi-circular arcs,Control tower operator suggested a meteor could explain one of the sightings,There were no confirmed aircraft in the area when the sightings occurred.
witness description: Control tower operator and a TV reporter.
